ygData.subject: Re: Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: It is so nice to have caught up to a lot of the twinkers finally. At lvl 33, I have a bunch of items that I worked hard for (including the Testament of
ygData.messageBody:
It is so nice to have caught up to a lot of the
"twinkers" finally. At lvl 33, I have a bunch of items that
I worked hard for (including the Testament of
Vanear, which can't be used to twink!!). <br><br>I think
non-twinks work harder and become better players because
things aren't handed to them easily. Especially druids--
lower level twinked druids can melee anything up to a
certain level, and then they're screwed because they
haven't perfected druid strategyies.<br><br>At lvl 16,
don't be discouraged. I think i was decked out in all
leather armor, with a piar of Derv Rings I go myself in
NRo, one +3WIS earring i was given, and a pair of SP
Hide Gloves I bought with all the money I had at the
time (17pp). Now that I have just about all the items
I think I'll need for awhile, WIS of 179 and about
1kpp in the bank (with all my lvl 34 spells already
bought), I look back and laugh at how tough it was!!! Your
time will come...<br><br>Fight on!!<br><br>Xela
